participants.name: Tania Katan
participants.title: Inspiring Corporations To Disrupt w/ Creativity Is My Jam. Are You Ready For This Jelly?

messages.message: Ok, one question, two parts: Where does your passion and profession overlap and why is it important that you and and I connect? Thanks!

Excellent question! I should use that. Computers are my passion and I weild them according to my professional requirements. It is important to me that we connect because I like to connect with really intelligent people and understand their ambitions while subconsciously holding them accountable to achieving their goals.
Was my answer to your question lavishly diplomatic?
Yes, I will consider voting for you in 2020!
Lol, are you high? Sounds like a good way to think about marketing. Do you meditate? I am working on this app sosmethod.herokuapp.com. It is similar to calm.com or headspace.
I wasn't being insulting I was just poking your groundedness ;)

Dude! I'm busy and popular and meditating, so unless you're gonna hire me create messaging that is engaging (not insulting) to those of us who are meditators and fluentthinkers...I got work to do! Pokingly yours-Tania

As soon as I find/create a successful startup I will offer you a job. Do you feel that we have an obligation to teach others? I've been struggling with this question at work where my learning is severely limited by micromanagers.
For reference: https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Neuroplasticity
This is where my head is at right now https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Agartha
